    • haveAllItemsBeenProcessed

      public static boolean haveAllItemsBeenProcessed(BatchProcessType queueType)
      check to see if all items have been processed
      Parameters:
      queueType - queue type
      Returns:
      true if all items have been processed (i.e. the work queue is empty). If the queue is not empty then an error likely occurred. Check your logs.

    • haveAllItemsBeenProcessed

      public static boolean haveAllItemsBeenProcessed(com.guidewire.pl.system.workqueue.WorkQueue workQueue)
      Check to see if all items hav ebeen processed
      Parameters:
      workQueue - work queue
      Returns:
      true if all items have been processed (i.e. the work queue is empty). If the queue is not empty then an error likely occurred. Check your logs.
